text_block_list.text: One day, in the afternoon―

I was out on a shopping errand, but I ended up in an unfamiliar 
place. While I was standing there at a loss……
Um～, excuse me.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Are you perhaps a trainer affiliated with the school?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Ah, I thought so～. I was pretty sure I'd seen you 
around the campus a few times before.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
By the way, it looks like something's troubling you. 
Is something the matter?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
When Grass Wonder kindly asked, I replied that it was my first 
time coming out this far and I was lost……
Oh my, that sounds like quite the predicament!
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: If you'd like, I could lead you back to the school.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Yes, I was just about to head back myself. 『The journey is as 
important as the people you meet along the way』♪
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I come here often to buy things for my hobby so, 
I'm familiar with the area. Soo～ just leave it to me.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Well then, shall we set off?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
While accompanied by the kind Uma Musume, Grass Wonder, 
we made our way back towards the school at a leisurely pace……

Huu～. If we've made it this far, 
the school should be nearby.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
The sun has already started setting, hasn't it～? I ended up 
walking at such a carefree pace…… I'm sorry about that.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Oh my. Trainer-san, it seems like you're 
someone who can appreciate 『Mono no Aware』.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
……in particular, 『Twilight』. The crimson-hued 
sky, each time you look at it, it changes slightly. 
It's quite beautiful because of that.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I feel like I could watch it forever…… 
Because of that, I end up slowing my pace without thinking.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
While speaking about that, I stood together 
with Grass Wonder, admiring the sky and―
(Guuuuuuu)
……Oh dear～.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Fufufuu, no, it's fine. After walking that much, 
it's not unusual to become hungry, is it?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
That's right, I happen to have something perfect 
for that with me. Trainer-san, do you mind if I 
take up just a little bit more of your time?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
If you're fine with it, Trainer-san, 
let me treat you to a 『Tea Ceremony』.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Yes, you could call it an outdoor tea party. Basking in the 
natural light, taking in the scents in the air all while enjoying 
tea. It's quite a refined cultural experience, you know?～
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Tea ceremonies are my hobby, you see. The whole 
reason I was out so far was to order some matcha 
and sweets from a store that I fancy.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I happen to have the proper equipment 
with me so…… how about it?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I'm glad～♪ Well then, 
I'll get everything prepared.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Then, I enjoyed a cup of tea and some elegant 
sweets prepared for me by Grass Wonder.
How was it, Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, I'm glad to hear it.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Being fulfilling for body and soul 
is one of the good points about tea.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
choice_data_list: Have you been practicing for long?
Have you been practicing for long?

text_block_list.text: Yes, since I was young.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Tea ceremonies, flower arrangement, calligraphy, Japanese dance…… 
oh, and a little training with the Naginata.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
No, no, it's not that impressive～. 
I just really like them all.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I was born in America, and both of my 
parents had a deep appreciation for Japan.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Because of that, I had a lot of exposure to the 
wonders of Japanese culture. It was only natural 
that I would grow an interest in it too.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
And back home, I had a teacher that had knowledge of this too, 
so I asked my parents if I could study under them.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Yes, of course!
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Because of that, courtesy, sincerity, consideration for others…… 
I learned many important things like that.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Well, I say that, but I have a 
lot I still need to work on.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Someday, I hope to be as refined and elegant, with the dignity 
of a Yamato Nadeshiko…… and to that end, I practice daily.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Oh…… I'm sorry, I seem to have gotten quite 
absorbed in our conversation.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: For now, let's return to the school♪
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
And so, I parted ways with Grass Wonder 
and headed towards the trainer dorms……

The Yamato Nadeshiko Uma Musume, Grass Wonder. 
A girl with a gentle smile that held tea ceremonies. 
I wonder how she would run?―
The answer would come unexpectedly quickly.

『Notice to all trainers. 
Regarding the next Selection Race』

Among the list of participants 
was the name 『Grass Wonder』
